p: The pH of the herbal gels were measured and presented in Table 7. The pH or the degree of acidity and alkalinity affects grossly the stability of pharmaceutical preparations. The optimum pH value of skin on most of our face and body lies between 4.5 and 5.5. Therefore, the skin's natural pH is mildly acidic. The herbal gels formulated had slightly acidic pH ranging from 4.5 ± 0.4 to 5.2 ± 0.4 and were in the range of the pH of the skin.
